overview: We admit it! Naked Escape is all a ploy to showcase hot, horny, hairy and naked guys in the great outdoors, and it works! The cocks are bouncing heavily between their legs as two naked guys desperately search for clothes while fleeing a mysterious pursuer in the redwoods of Northern California. What would you do to get something to wear? These guys will do anything. Anything.
title: Naked Escape
